title: And now for the finale : Positions and vectors
subtitle: (For your own sanity, get a pen and paper)
operators: (function(input1,input2){ var result = input1.state + input2.state; console.log('+',input1.state, input2.state, result%8); return (result%8);  } )

(function(input1,input2){ var result = input1.state - (input2.state<=4?input2.state:(8-input2.state)); if (result < 0) { result = 8+result}; console.log('-',input1.state, input2.state, result%8); return (result%8);  } )
(function(input1,input2){ var result = input1.state + 4; console.log('+4',input1.state, result%8); return (result%8);   } )
